# The `StringMatcher` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Given a list of strings and code to execute when they match, output a simple switch tree to classify the input string.

If a match is found, the code in Matches&#91;i&#93;.second is executed; control must not exit this code fragment. If nothing matches, execution falls through.

Definition at line 30 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/tablegen/stringmatcher-h">StringMatcher.h</a>.
